subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar is looking into reports that Kyle Busch and the 65-year-old car owner Richard Childress were involved in an altercation after the Trucks Series race at Kansas Speedway.
snippet: Nascar is looking into reports that Kyle Busch and the 65-year-old car owner Richard Childress were involved in an altercation after the Trucks Series race at Kansas Speedway.
